title: First Blog Post
content: Today was rough. I stepped in 6 puddles and by the time I got home from work, my socks were SOAKED. It was my last pair :(

title: A Very Bad Day
content: The Good Lorde did not smile down upon me today. I had the great misfortune of being robbed of my wallet, phone, and clothes by a group of small, vile children-boys. Never show your face to the world again, old man, they told me each time as they rubbed my face into 6 different filth puddles. Kids these days!

title: No Reprieve
content: I've had it. Today my garbage son Jaidynne smelted my brand new luxury Saab into a giant trophy that he engraved with 'I'm a sad dad. I don't cry; I Saab. Why did Karen leave me with such a garbage child? Why must my son torment me?
